meanings.definition: A mystery novel or play in which the identity of the perpetrator is revealed at the end.
meanings.sent1: The children enjoyed reading a whodunit together.
meanings.sent2: The library had a whole section dedicated to whodunits.
meanings.sent3: The whodunit kept them guessing until the very last page.
meanings.sent4: The whodunit unraveled its secrets like a tangled thread.
meanings.sent5: The whodunit's conclusion was as surprising as a hidden treasure.

meanings.definition: A detective story or mystery that focuses on solving a crime.
meanings.sent1: She loved watching whodunits on TV.
meanings.sent2: The bookstore had a sale on classic whodunits.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to solve the whodunit of the missing toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: The investigation turned the whodunit into a thrilling chase.
meanings.sent5: The whodunit's resolution was as satisfying as a completed puzzle.
